title: Implement Finance Data Fetcher with TaskGroup
description: Use TaskGroup to fetch multiple financial data endpoints concurrently with proper error handling.
instructions: Complete the `fetch_all_finance_data` function using TaskGroup. It should fetch accounts, transactions, and budgets concurrently. If any fetch fails, the function should handle the ExceptionGroup gracefully and return partial results.

hints.text: Create a TaskGroup and use create_task() for each fetch function. Wrap in try/except* to handle ExceptionGroup.
Use except* ConnectionError as eg to catch all ConnectionError exceptions. Loop through eg.exceptions to process each one.

commonMistakes.mistake: Using regular except instead of except*
commonMistakes.correction: Use except* for catching exception groups in Python 3.11+
